ComicInfo.Title: Issue 4
ComicInfo.Summary:
An all-new Highlander mini-series event spanning the ages as Connor MacLeod searches for the lost sword of his mentor, Ramirez!
It all ends here as Fathom writer JT Krul, and penciller Carlos Rafael and colorist Carlos Lopez, complete the way of the sword! As with all things in Connor's life, victory comes with great sacrifice and the quest for Ramirez's long-lost sword is no exception!
Features connecting covers by Jean Diaz!
